name: Ground Fox
description:
Ground Fox is a short (3 minutes) skill game that lets you fly a ship, avoiding obstacles, shooting at enemies and collecting points. It was developed as an assignment for a Unity course by Ben Tristem, Rick Davidson, and the GameDev.tv Team. Visual assets and some initial code were taken from the course materials.

HOW TO PLAY: Use the spacebar to shoot and wasd or arrow keys to move.

Source code available here: https://github.com/jabuchae/unitycourselvl1/tree/master/GroundFox
